text.text_translated:
Cape Town can be dangerous for baboons.  
Baboons can be hurt in car accidents.  
Baboons can be electrocuted by electric wires.  
Baboons are an endangered species.  
The city council hired Baboon Monitors to help baboons and stop problems.  
Baboon Monitors watch baboons in the city.  
Their job is to chase baboon​s out of town.  
They also catch baboons.  
They release baboons in the countryside.  
This plan has some success.  
It reduces problems between people and baboons.  
But it is hard to stop baboons from coming back.  
They come back because the town has easy food.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Cape Town can be dangerous for baboons.  
Baboons can be hurt in car accidents.  
Baboons can be killed by electric wires.  
There are not many baboons left in the world.  
The city council hired Baboon Monitors.  
Baboon Monitors are people who watch baboons.  
Their job is to chase baboons out of the city.  
They also catch baboons and release them in the countryside.  
This plan has some success.  
It makes fewer problems between people and baboons.  
But it is hard to stop baboons from coming back.  
They come back because the city has easy food.
